## Key Design Principles

1. **Hierarchical Visual Cues**: Different border styles (solid, dashed, dotted) to show nesting levels
2. **Consistent Add Buttons**: âŠ• symbols at appropriate levels for peer creation
3. **Component Grouping**: News items contain all required components (headline, image, description, table option)
4. **Auto-population**: New categories automatically include one starter news item
5. **Progressive Disclosure**: Tables collapse/expand, complex editors open in modals
6. **Mobile-First**: Responsive design that works on all screen sizes
